title: can someone help me with my ms?
body: my ms is always around 49-50 but today the past 3 games its stuck on 130-120 and it doesnt move, i tried restarting everything but its still stuck. can someone help me its really annoying to cast a spell 0.5/1 sec after i pressed it

replies.body: Your connection may have weakened at some point and increased your ping.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, which should help tune up your connection to the game server.  I hope that helps!

Well, since it's Christmas break, it's entirely possible that you'll simply have to deal with this until the beginning/middle of January, simply due to the influx of people at home, using the internet. I'm assuming you live in a relatively populated area to experience the increase in ping.

Are you currently using an ethernet cable, rather than getting your internet wirelessly? An ethernet cable helps tremendously with making your ping stable, though it may not necessarily decrease it. Another idea is to try resetting your router, as they occasionally malfunction and need to be reset. If none of the above works, try following the instructions on here from Riot on fixing any connection issues: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

You could also try submitting a help and support ticket, but prepare for some frustrating interactions with them; they are going to ask you for a lot of files that you'll need to be able to obtain, and frankly it's pretty damn confusing. By all means though, if nothing else seems to be working, you might as well try it.
